title: 2016 WORLDS VIEWING PARTIES HOYTS
body:
I just wanted to know me and my freinds got tickets for a Hoyts viewing party and we are all getting hyped for a show bag but looking further it doesn't look like we will get one is this true or will we get one 

Also will we get a mystery skin code

replies.body:
Ehhh I'm not sure if your talking about carousel Hoyt's in Perth? If it is you don't get a show bag but you do get a 3 day IP boost. Kinda disappointing last year we got a whole show bag and a mystery skin.

Me and my friends were gonna go but none of us can be stuffed waking up at like 6 in the morning just for worlds.
Plus then you have to go to Carousel which usually means getting stabbed

> [{quoted}](name=Arkangyle,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rEThEjV1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-27T07:23:27.705+0000)
>
> Plus then you have to go to Carousel which usually means getting stabbed

Lmao that too
Well at least SKT are in it
Well that suck my friends are going to be so disappointed

Hey Shadowdaze13,

The ticket comes with a 3 DAY IP Boost and reserved seating.

You can see more details about it here: http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/hoyts-viewing-parties/
